bannerImage.desc: To ensure the banner looks good on all devices, use an image that is at least 2028 x 1152 pixels (file size up to 5MB).
bannerImage.title: The banner will be located at the top of your channel page.

profileImage.desc: We recommend using images at least 98 x 98 pixels (file size up to 4 MB) in PNG or GIF format (no animation).
profileImage.title: Your profile picture is the channel icon that appears next to your videos and comments on UaTube.
